name: Mall Horror Demo
description:
Description

This is a technical demo/proof of concept of an upcoming game called Mall Horror (working title). 

In this game you play as a young detective named Mike. To prove yourself you must solve a mysterious cold case by analyzing tape recordings of old security footage.

The recordings depict the grizzled detective Dick Miller in his prime as he explores a shopping mall at night and discovers some strange occurrences.

Controls

Use the Left mouse to aim the cursor and click to walk to the cursor's position.
